Description: Rim and body sherd of early Chian patterned pottery chalice with cul and handle root; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky dark brown below with possible traces of bands in added white below rim; exterior: black on handle; trace of single brown band below handle; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0263) (phase 2)
